languages.text: Кьява Гамма росла, основывались новые мануфакторумы, но спустя годы стали поступать тревожащие доклады. Казалось, что кто-то тайно перехватил управление колонией, окутав сетями заговора и умолчаний. Ни дознание, ни угрозы техножрецам, ни казни не помогали — некто из тени покрыл своей паутиной планету и вершил загадочные планы.

Kiava Gamma grew and new manufactorums were founded, until disturbing reports started to trickle in many years later. It seemed that someone had secretly taken control of the colony, shrouding it in a tangle of conspiracy. Neither enquiries nor threats to Tech-Priests or executions helped. Someone in the shadows was weaving their web and making secret plans.
languages.original_text: Кьява Гамма росла, основывались новые мануфакторумы, но спустя годы стали поступать тревожащие доклады. Казалось, что кто-то тайно перехватил управление колонией, окутав сетями заговора и умолчаний. Ни дознание, ни угрозы техножрецам, ни казни не помогали — некто из тени покрыл своей паутиной планету и вершил загадочные планы.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma grew and new manufactorums were founded, until disturbing reports started to trickle in many years later. It seemed that someone had secretly taken control of the colony, shrouding it in a tangle of conspiracy. Neither inquiries nor threats to tech-priests or executions helped. Someone in the shadows was weaving their web and making unhurried secret plans.

Kiava Gamma grew and new manufactorums were founded, until disturbing reports started to trickle in many years later. It seemed that someone had secretly taken control of the colony, shrouding it in a tangle of conspiracy. Neither inquiries nor threats to tech-priests or executions helped. Someone in the shadows was weaving their web and making unhurried secret plans.

Kiava Gamma grew and new manufactorums were founded, until disturbing reports started to trickle in many years later. It seemed that someone had secretly taken control of the colony, shrouding it in a tangle of conspiracy. Neither inquiries nor threats to Tech-Priests or executions helped. Someone in the shadows was weaving their web and making secret plans.

Kiava Gamma grew and new manufactorums were founded, until disturbing reports started to trickle in many years later. It seemed that someone had secretly taken control of the colony, shrouding it in a tangle of conspiracy. Neither inquiries nor threats to Tech-Priests or executions helped. Someone in the shadows was weaving their web and making secret plans.

Kiava Gamma grew and new manufactorums were founded, until disturbing reports started to trickle in many years later. It seemed that someone had secretly taken control of the colony, shrouding it in a tangle of conspiracy. Neither enquiries nor threats to Tech-Priests or executions helped. Someone in the shadows was weaving their web and making secret plans.

languages.text: 基亚瓦伽马星不断发展壮大，新的制造工厂与雨后春笋般涌现出来。但许多年后，令人不安的报告却不断陆续出现。看起来，似乎是有什么人秘密地控制了这个殖民地，将它缠绕在错综复杂的阴谋之中。无论是调查、威胁那些技术神甫，还是大规模处决都无济于事。有什么人在暗处制定着秘密计划，编织着阴谋之网。
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma grew and new manufactorums were founded, until disturbing reports started to trickle in many years later. It seemed that someone had secretly taken control of the colony, shrouding it in a tangle of conspiracy. Neither enquiries nor threats to Tech-Priests or executions helped. Someone in the shadows was weaving their web and making secret plans.

traits.locale_text: 基亚瓦伽马星不断发展壮大，新的制造工厂与雨后春笋般涌现出来。但许多年后，令人不安的报告却不断陆续出现。看起来，似乎是有什么人秘密地控制了这个殖民地，将它缠绕在错综复杂的阴谋之中。无论是调查、威胁那些技术祭司，还是大规模处决都无济于事。有什么人在暗处制定着秘密计划，编织着阴谋之网。

languages.text: キアヴァ・ガンマは発展し、新たな聖工場が設立され、数年後にはおぞましい報告が漏れ伝わってきた。誰かが秘密裏にコロニーを支配し、それを絡み合う陰謀で覆い隠しているようであった。技術司祭に対しては詮議も脅迫も、あるいは処刑も役に立たなかった。陰から誰かが網を張り巡らし、秘密の計画を練っていたのだ。
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma grew and new manufactorums were founded, until disturbing reports started to trickle in many years later. It seemed that someone had secretly taken control of the colony, shrouding it in a tangle of conspiracy. Neither enquiries nor threats to Tech-Priests or executions helped. Someone in the shadows was weaving their web and making secret plans.

traits.locale_text: キアヴァ・ガンマは発展し、新たな聖工場が設立され、数年後にはおぞましい報告が漏れ伝わってきた。誰かが秘密裏にコロニーを支配し、それを絡み合う陰謀で覆い隠しているようであった。技術司祭に対しては詮議も脅迫も、あるいは処刑も役に立たなかった。陰から誰かが網を張り巡らし、秘密の計画を練っていたのだ。

languages.text: Kiava Gamma se développa et de nouveaux manufactorums furent bâtis, jusqu'à ce que des rapports troublants se mettent à arriver des années plus tard. Apparemment, quelqu'un avait pris le contrôle de la colonie dans le plus grand secret, en s'entourant d'un voile de conspiration. Les enquêtes, les menaces contre les technoprêtres ou les exécutions n'y changèrent rien. Dans l'ombre, quelqu'un tissait sa toile et élaborait des plans secrets.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma grew and new manufactorums were founded, until disturbing reports started to trickle in many years later. It seemed that someone had secretly taken control of the colony, shrouding it in a tangle of conspiracy. Neither enquiries nor threats to Tech-Priests or executions helped. Someone in the shadows was weaving their web and making secret plans.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma se développa et de nouveaux manufactorums furent bâtis, jusqu'à ce que des rapports troublants se mettent à arriver des années plus tard. Apparemment, quelqu'un avait pris le contrôle de la colonie dans le plus grand secret, en s'entourant d'un voile de conspiration. Les enquêtes, les menaces contre les technoprêtres ou les exécutions n'y changèrent rien. Dans l'ombre, quelqu'un tissait sa toile et élaborait des plans secrets.

languages.text: Kiava Gamma creció y fundó nuevos manufactorums hasta que unos informes inquietantes empezaron a sucederse muchos años después. Parece que alguien había tomado en secreto las riendas de la colonia, envolviéndola en una maraña de conspiraciones. Ni las solicitudes, ni las amenazas ni las ejecuciones de tecnosacerdotes esclarecieron la situación. Alguien tejía una red entre las sombras, desarrollando planes secretos.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma grew and new manufactorums were founded, until disturbing reports started to trickle in many years later. It seemed that someone had secretly taken control of the colony, shrouding it in a tangle of conspiracy. Neither enquiries nor threats to Tech-Priests or executions helped. Someone in the shadows was weaving their web and making secret plans.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma creció y fundó nuevos manufactorums hasta que unos informes inquietantes empezaron a sucederse muchos años después. Parece que alguien había tomado en secreto las riendas de la colonia, envolviéndola en una maraña de conspiraciones. Ni las solicitudes, ni las amenazas ni las ejecuciones de tecnosacerdotes esclarecieron la situación. Alguien tejía una red entre las sombras, desarrollando planes secretos.

languages.text: Kiava Gamma wuchs, und neue Manufactorien wurden errichtet, bis viele Jahre später beunruhigende Berichte die Runde machten. Anscheinend hatte jemand insgeheim die Kontrolle über die Kolonie übernommen und sie in ein Gewirr aus Verschwörungen eingesponnen. Weder Ermittlungen noch Drohungen an Techpriester oder Hinrichtungen halfen. Jemand im Schatten wob sein Netz und hatte geheime Pläne.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma grew and new manufactorums were founded, until disturbing reports started to trickle in many years later. It seemed that someone had secretly taken control of the colony, shrouding it in a tangle of conspiracy. Neither enquiries nor threats to Tech-Priests or executions helped. Someone in the shadows was weaving their web and making secret plans.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma wuchs, und neue Manufactorien wurden errichtet, bis viele Jahre später beunruhigende Berichte die Runde machten. Anscheinend hatte jemand insgeheim die Kontrolle über die Kolonie übernommen und sie in ein Gewirr aus Verschwörungen eingesponnen. Weder Ermittlungen noch Drohungen an Techpriester oder Hinrichtungen halfen. Jemand im Schatten wob sein Netz und hatte geheime Pläne.

languages.text: Kiava Gama büyüdü, gezegene yeni manufaktorumlar kuruldu. Yıllar sonra birtakım rahatsız edici söylentiler gün yüzüne çıktı. Birileri gizlice koloninin kontrolünü ele geçirmiş ve onu bir komplo ağının içine sürüklemiş gibi görünüyordu. Tekno Rahiplere yönelik sorgulamalar, tehditler ve infazlar sonuç vermedi. Gölgelerde saklanan birisi, ağlarını örüyor ve gizli planlar yapıyordu.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma grew and new manufactorums were founded, until disturbing reports started to trickle in many years later. It seemed that someone had secretly taken control of the colony, shrouding it in a tangle of conspiracy. Neither enquiries nor threats to Tech-Priests or executions helped. Someone in the shadows was weaving their web and making secret plans.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gama büyüdü ve gezegene yeni manufaktorumlar kuruldu, ta ki yıllar sonra bazı rahatsızlık verici söylentiler gün yüzüne çıkmaya başlayıncaya kadar. Birileri gizlice koloninin kontrolünü ele geçirmiş ve onu bir komplo ağının içine sürüklemiş gibi görünüyordu. Tekno Rahiplere yönelik sorgulamalar da, tehditler de sonuç vermedi. İnfazlar da. Gölgelerdeki biri ağlarını örüyor ve gizli planlar yapıyordu.
